ConnectionStrings.BiblioNexusDb: Database connection string using Azure identity. Either get local or grab from dev app service config
ConnectionStrings.AzureStorageAccount: Connection string for the Azure Storage Account that is used for job queues.

ApplicationInsights.ConnectionString: Application insights connection string. Get from Azure instance.

Auth0Settings.ApiClientId: This is the API's client id on Auth0
Auth0Settings.ApplicationClientId: This is the web application's client id on Auth0
Auth0Settings.Audience: under applications, targeted machine to machine application
Auth0Settings.BaseUri: and finally settings of said machine to machine application.
